Posts.EditableText: Just curious about the registration side of things for V4. If you've bought a previous version, do you need to buy the new one or will it be a free upgrade?
Posts.HTML: Just curious about the registration side of things for V4. If you've bought a previous version, do you need to buy the new one or will it be a free upgrade?

Posts.EditableText:
I believe this may help you a little.

[quote="On The Website, Alex":34yupgsj]Free Upgrades to 3.x 
Get the latest updates to Quest Pro 3 and QDK Pro 3 as soon as they are released. For example, if you order Quest Pro 3.53 today, you'll receive all updates numbered 3.54, 3.6 etc. Plus you'll get a discount on Quest Pro 4.0![/quote:34yupgsj]

I think there was a topic about this somewhere else, maybe on another page.

It seems to me like you'll have to purchase Quest 4.0, but get a discount if you've already bought your 3.x copy.
Posts.HTML:
I believe this may help you a little.

On The Website, Alex wrote:Free Upgrades to 3.x
Get the latest updates to Quest Pro 3 and QDK Pro 3 as soon as they are released. For example, if you order Quest Pro 3.53 today, you'll receive all updates numbered 3.54, 3.6 etc. Plus you'll get a discount on Quest Pro 4.0!


I think there was a topic about this somewhere else, maybe on another page.

It seems to me like you'll have to purchase Quest 4.0, but get a discount if you've already bought your 3.x copy.
